name: SEXWIFE: NO LIMIT
description:
SEXWIFE: No Limit is a game based on real experience where you have to dive into the abyss of passion of a sexy wife and forbidden desires of her husband.



Go on dates with characters, flirt and make love in front of her husband.



The game combines visual novel and game puzzles that will not let you get bored and make your gaming experience as enjoyable as possible.



Also in the game you will find:
  • 5 different stories
  • The opportunity to sleep with absolutely any character
  • Juicy and bright characters that are hard to forget
  • More than 300 pictures
